title: The Great Flamarion (Film-Noir, 1945) by Anthony Mann with  Erich von Stroheim | Movie

sources.title: The Great Flamarion (Film-Noir, 1945) by Anthony Mann with  Erich von Stroheim | Movie
sources.description:
Great with a gun!!
Part of an entertainment act, a beautiful but unscrupulous female performer manipulates all the men in her life in order to achieve her aims.

Original title: The Great Flamarion (1945) AKA: Strange Affair / Dead Pigeon

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/o617PIN8pWc


Director: Anthony Mann
Writers: Anne Wigton, Heinz Herald, Richard Weil
Stars: Erich von Stroheim, Mary Beth Hughes, Dan Duryea
Genres:  Classics, Crime, Drama, Film-Noir, Mystery, Romance, Thriller


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
02:55 A murder mystery unfolds during a performance at a theater, leading to interrogations and revelations.
10:47 A tale of betrayal and regret unfolds as Flamarion confesses to a crime, leading to a tense confrontation.
18:26 A mysterious interaction unfolds between Connie and Flamarion, revealing secrets and tensions.
22:10 A story of love, betrayal, and revenge unfolds as Flamarion navigates complex relationships.
26:58 Troubling signs of alcoholism, concerns for safety, and a complicated relationship between characters.
32:03 Betrayal and deception unfold as Al and Connie discuss their failed performances and uncertain future together.
37:14 Betrayal and consequences unravel in a tense conversation between Eddie and Al, leading to a potential departure.
41:45 A dramatic turn of events unfolds as characters navigate through a complex web of relationships and decisions.
51:44 A mysterious conversation unfolds between Al and a woman, leading to unexpected events.
59:13 Mysterious encounters lead Brandt on a quest to find Connie, encountering various obstacles along the way.
1:06:10 Betrayal and revenge unfold in a film featuring deceit, manipulation, and a tragic ending.
